reviews.review: Uma parte da evolução do cs de lan house! Top demais
This game is great. And cool graphics especially a 2004 game.
谢谢这个游戏和国内各个社区服务器的大家带给我的回忆
Cs go dan daha zevkli :D  tavsiye ederim

相对于硬核要技术的CSGO，我更喜欢CSS。
因为CSS有太多的社区MOD，一套又一套反复换MOD，让游戏的乐趣无穷无尽。
CSS的Bot也比CSGO要强了太多，起源的专家级Bot，几百米开外AK一枪爆头，分分钟教你做人。
L A   Y U T A   O P R E S O R A      VS    los negros de turno viteh
how does this cost more then CSGO??
bun joc, cu grafica destul de buna!
Muy buen juego, Esta bien optimizado, la comunidad no es tan toxica como la de CSGO, Creo que podria decir que me gusta mas CS:S que CS:GO
Um otimo game pra entreterimento e pra se dirvertir!

Es buen juego, considero el mejor cs, primero porque no lo pusieron gratis como a la oveja negra la cual no pienso mencionar, y segundo porque considero que es el mas "realista", tambien porque no es ni muy pesado ni muy liviano, el unico problema que le encuentro es su precio pero lo compre en el pack de valve y me salio todo como 87 pesos asi que medio que me chupa un huevo, no hay mucho que decir a estas alturas de este juego xd
Old but gold,better than csgo.. Good old times ^^

Benim pc tam bir patates olmasına rağmen bu oyunu rahat çalıştırıyor ve CS:GO havasını çok iyi veriyor. Herkese fazlasıyla tavsiye ederim.

NOT:HİLE SAYISI ÇOK AZ :D
i only bought it for the GMOD textures

1.6 tadı veren düşük bilgisayarlarda bile iyi çalışan güzel oyun
bilgisayarınız csgo kaldırmıyorsa source yi kesinlikle tavsiye ederim

Counter Strike Source:
Has more weapons 
Can have your own custom spray
Has better weapon sounds 
Has a good community


Counter Strike Global Offensive:
Has less weapons 
You must get a spray from the community market or a drop
Has mediocre weapon sounds 
Very very Toxic Community 

(I’m not saying csgo is a bad game, it’s pretty fun, but css is better in many ways
too many hackers, steam ban them all please thank you good night
Механика с 1.6 перенесена. Одно слово - классика.
One of the best games ever created.
Buen juego. Es la mezcla entre CSGO y CS 1.6. Lo recomiendo en ofertas.
good game played it alot with friends
Настольгия. Но очень бесят школьники и непонятные админы!
Помню времена, когда я в эту CS часто играл. Всем рекомендую...
Ein sehr gutes Spiel, es hat dafür das es so alt ist eine gute Grafik. Nur die Server sind kaum voll. Aber ein gutes Spiel!
this game is so damn smooth and the movement here is totally superior to that in GO.. buy this game for just movement alone ...
No jak zawsze lepsze od GO
Diferente de seu sucessor. Ele funciona. E também tem suporte a mods o que é delicioso.

Complete garbage game if I do say so myself. Most of the people in the CS:SOURCE community are either complete RNG players or just overrall shit. Really sad to see valve had actually come out with this game. This game flat out sucks and garbage. RNG is the competing adversary that will always win against skill. Please do not play this game. The community is just as bad as csgo's. Most of the kids who play this game are people who are anime bhoppers who are a fan of lolyou or phoon. Both of these players are also complete RNG and lucky. These two players influenced the tactic of rushing everything. Thanks to these idiots, now the CS:SOURCE community consists of shit players who just rush everything and RNG and how lucky people can get in this game. I highly do NOT recommend this game. Horrible hitboxes, literally impossible to spray the ak or any other rifle. Deagle is very over powered and could take out a full bought person with a rifle. It's sad how bad this game is. CS:SOURCE is the unwanted child of Valve and I finally understand why Valve didn't do anything to fix this game because of how random and lucky people get. Jumping headshots, hentai furry bhoppers every where. Garbage straight garbage.

First I would like to say that you can actually play this game on and computer or labtop because on max graphics its still super easy on your cpu, AND this game is just so FUCKING fun, like why are you reading this BUY THE GAME, if you want.
In ALL ways, WAY better than CS:GO.

I don't think that people get why this game has really many players. I mean the reason why this game has many players is because when you bought half-life 2 you got cs:s with it. It was not meant to be bought on steam.
There's a reason CS:S costs more than CS:GO. CS:GO is garbage. That's all.
good game will purchase again when i'm not so frugal with my money.
Me gustó que esté tan completo, a diferencia de sus antecesores. 10/10
Mt top, Ter uma noçao de um game mais antigo, um CS mais antigo, bem legal msm
SO MUCH FUN HOLY FUCK SO MUCH BETTER CSGO.

Bardzo przyjemnie oderwać się od rutyny, od najnowszej wersji jednego z najpopularniejszych FPS'ow - CS:GO i przypomnieć sobie stare czasy. 
Jak na stara gre to genialna grafika, stare dzwieki znane z 1.6, duzo pelnych serverow, brak krzyczacych dzieci i jeszcze wiecej dobrego czeka was w CS:S =]
Primary reason why I bought it was because i needed the textures for GMod

Muy buen juego, lastima que al jugar en red nadie actue en equipo!!.
2004，cs:source is a really good game that time,and before we played cs1.6.But I prefer 1.6 because of the Shield！
